name: Deus Vult II
description: Pwad file from the Doomworld forums. Requires either the DOOM 2 or the Freedoom phase 2 iwad to play.

files.doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.

content:
files:
- doom2: N/A:Please select either the DOOM 2 or Freedoom phase 2 iwad file.
- dvii: http://youfailit.net/pub/idgames/levels/doom2/Ports/d-f/dvii-1i.zip
game:
  files:
  - DVII-1i.wad
  - brightmaps.pk3
  main_file: $doom2
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: $dvii
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $doom2
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/data/DVII-1i.wad
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/data/brightmaps.pk3
